ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens + <2> Canon 200DG DSLR Camera Case + <3> Canon 62-inch Deluxe Tripod + <4> Canon Optical Cleaning Kit +
<5> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <6> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <7> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <8> Battery Grip for Canon 5D +
<9> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <10> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <11> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<13> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <14> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower + <15> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <16> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens with 64GB Card + Grip + Battery & Charger + Case + Tripod + Kit
